		character = root

				exists = scope:root_naked

			}
		}

	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left

			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}

				no_clothes
			}
		}

	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition

				}
				# 3: EventsSex.HANDJOB -> EventsSex.HANDJOB failed
				# You're too turned on to be satisfied with just jerking him off\n
				desc = sex_transition_10003
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.1.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 1
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0

			DRAMA = yes

			chance = 20
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 20
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.44
	}
}

					exists = scope:sex_transition

				}

			}

		name = LIDAoption.46

	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = gallows

	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner

				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10007
				}
				# 7: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# The incessant invasion of his member down your throat momentarily puts you in a trance, leaving the initiative in his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10007
			}
		}

				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.2.desc

			CHANGE = -1
		}

			CHARACTER_1 = root

			DRAMA = yes
		}

			chance = 10

		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {

			}
		}

LIDAc.6 = {
	# Down the Gullet
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.6.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10012
				}
				# 12: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# Putting both hands on his waist, you attempt to curb his thrusts. However, on your knees beneath him, you don't have enough leverage to forcefully stop him and he seems to have no intention of letting you back in control.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10012
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10017
				}
				# 17: EventsSex.DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB failed
				# Putting both hands on his waist, you push and try to stop his thrusts. It's all in vain, however, as he ignores you.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10017
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.6.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -2
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 20
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 20
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.48
	}
}
LIDAc.4 = {
	# A Firm Grasp on His Release
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.4.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10006
				}
				# 6: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.HANDJOB failed
				# The potent musk of his member, inflated by the proximity of your nose to his pubes, strangely captivates you and you lose this opportunity to assert more dominance.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10006
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10007
				}
				# 7: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# The incessant invasion of his member down your throat momentarily puts you in a trance, leaving the initiative in his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10007
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.4.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 2
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 35
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 35
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.49
	}
}
LIDAc.7 = {
	# More Icing on the Cake
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.7.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10039
				}
				# 39: EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# You attempt to pull away and recover some control, but you find it hard to focus and pull away from this pleasure.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10039
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10040
				}
				# 40: EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB failed
				# You attempt to extricate yourself with gravity's assistance. However, he grabs your arms and hoists you up, giving you a few sharp thrusts while spanking you as punishment for trying to escape.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10040
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.7.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 10
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 10
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.50
	}
}
LIDAc.8 = {
	# Plowing the Fields
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.8.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10039
				}
				# 39: EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# You attempt to pull away and recover some control, but you find it hard to focus and pull away from this pleasure.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10039
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10040
				}
				# 40: EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB failed
				# You attempt to extricate yourself with gravity's assistance. However, he grabs your arms and hoists you up, giving you a few sharp thrusts while spanking you as punishment for trying to escape.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10040
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.8.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -3
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 1.0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 20
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 20
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.51
	}
}
